name: Between Times (magyk_dev, pewpewpewpewpew, Lucifr1, MRCD, mrb0h)
name_original: Between Times (magyk_dev, pewpewpewpewpew, Lucifr1, MRCD, mrb0h)
description:
Between Times is a 2D platformer with two protagonists from different timelines between which you have to switch to overcome different parts of the level.

This game was developed for the Franken GameJam 2022

Controls:

Movement - A/D, Space

Time Shifting - LShift

Interact - E
